K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-1: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-2: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-3: 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-4: sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-6: rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-7: gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-8: snying po bla ma 'di skad bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-10: ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-11: shin tu gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khad nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:49b-12: yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-0: lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo 'bur bzhis mdzes @50a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-1: pa; rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla mas kun du 'khyil pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-2: ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyibs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-3: kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-5: tshad dpag tu med pa; ye shes rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-12: reg bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang byung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-13: gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas klubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-14: tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-15: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-16: phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-17: shin tu gsang ba pas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-19: stobs glang po che'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-22: thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-23: rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-24: gos pa med pa padma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-25: ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-26: yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50a-27: ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-0: thogs @50b pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-1: rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-2: nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-3: gdod nas dri ma med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-4: rnam par dag pa padmo gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-5: re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-6: yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-7: ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-8: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-9: yon tan chen po'i gdan steng na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-10: sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad du zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-11: thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-12: ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-13: sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-15: btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-17: btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-19: btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:50b-21: btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-1: kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-2: btsun mo dam pa bskyed pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal kun kyang mthing ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-6: ljang khu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste gnyis su med par 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-8: dper na; til gyi gang bu 'am mngar gyi sbram bu bzhin kun tu bde ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-9: de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-10: bcun mo gzigs par bya ba'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-11: byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-12: btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-13: byang chub chen po rdo rje snom dbang bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-14: btsun mo bsnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-15: byang chub chen po rdo rje myong dbang bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-16: btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-17: byang chub chen po rdo rje gsog shes bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-18: btsun mo sgron ma'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-19: byang chub chen po rdo rje gcod shes bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-20: btsun mo gdug pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-21: byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-22: btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-23: byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-24: btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-25: 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g-yas bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-26: btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51a-27: 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g-yon bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-0: btsun @51b mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-1: 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-2: btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-3: 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg 'dus bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-4: btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-5: de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla ma na bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-7: ae ma'o de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-8: ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-9: dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor bde mchog rin chen gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-10: mi zad gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-11: bla med byang chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-12: rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-13: sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-14: rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i nges don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-15: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:51b-16: dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang bo'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa bla ma rdo @52a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-1: rje kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i bla ma la 'jug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-2: gsang pa'i bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-3: aom chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-4: kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-5: ma g-yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-6: bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-7: phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-8: nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-10: dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-11: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-12: phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-13: dbang med skal ngan gsal ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-14: nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-15: rgyal ba yongs kyi gsang ba'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-16: sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-17: kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-19: ho:/ de nas btsun mo bya ba kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-21: aom/ sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-22: kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-23: ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-24: shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-25: n'i la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa; ;gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-26: rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-27: byang chub mchog gi nang gtan bkrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52a-28: ma chags padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-0: 'gro don byang chub @52b sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-1: 'gro lnga skye zhing dbang du bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-2: sku gsung thugs nas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-4: de nas bya ba mo kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-8: bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-9: dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-10: bdud rtsi char chen dbab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-12: de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-14: aom/ rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-15: gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char dbab phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-17: mi dmigs bde dang spro ba 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-18: kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-19: zhes ched du gleng ste gnyis su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma khyad par du spags ba rdul phra mo snyed thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-21: gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-23: 'gro ba drug gdul ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-24: lha yi gnas na brgya byin mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:52b-25: lha ma yin la thags bzang ris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-2: yi dvags gnas na kha 'bar bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-3: byol song seng+ge nyid du smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-4: dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-5: sku dang cha lugs tshul ston cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-6: la la lhums zhugs sku la bltams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-7: la la tshul srung rab tu byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-8: la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-9: la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-10: la la bcu drug chos la btsud; ;la la me 'bar chur yang 'brub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-11: la la nam mkha' sgra ru 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-12: la la rdo rje brag tu sra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-13: la la gso gsod pham rgyal byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-14: la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-15: la la bdud 'dul ngan song spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-17: kun kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-18: de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-19: theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-20: gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-21: gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-22: bzhi pa gnyis kyi lta spyod spyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-23: bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-24: bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-25: theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-26: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-28: mang la 'brel pas dra ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-29: thun mong min pas gsang ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53a-30: theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-0: snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas bsgyur ba @53b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-1: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-2: de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-4: snyigs ma med par gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-5: ae ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-7: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-9: sa chu sbyan dang m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-10: me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-11: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-12: srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-13: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:53b-14: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61a-24: kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61a-26: gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61a-27: bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61a-28: spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61a-29: bsgyur bas rang sems ye shes gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-0: de nyid shes rab thabs @61b su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-1: rgyu 'phrul dra ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-2: phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-3: de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la gcig char bzhugs te rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-4: shin tu phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-5: dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-6: gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-7: mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-8: shin tu phra bas rnam sbyangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-9: rig pas rgya khyon tshad med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-10: gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-11: mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-12: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-13: tshogs chen gnyis las 'grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-14: 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-15: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-16: rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-17: ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-18: tsa ka li dang tshon rtsi dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-19: bya dang mi bya med pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-20: de la dgag par ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-22: sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-23: bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-24: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-25: srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-26: dga' ba chen pos tshim pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-27: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dgongs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:61b-28: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-2: gang na 'ang yod pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-3: rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-4: dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-5: kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-6: de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-7: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-8: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-9: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-10: rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-11: snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-12: bla ma mnyes phyir gus ldan dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-13: dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-14: dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pa yin; ;gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-15: skyon rnams ma lus nges pa 'byang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-16: dad ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-17: phan pa'i dbang nod theg tshad sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-18: des na dbang phyug rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-19: dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-20: 'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-21: grub pa sa 'dzin rgyal po sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-23: gang 'dod rim gyis sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-24: blo dang ldan pas theg tshad nod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-25: yang na sras kyi dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-26: chud ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-27: sems kyi rnam pa nying khu blud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-28: sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-29: de nas dbang phyug chen po des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-30: mi 'gyur sngol [?] mar sku bskyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-31: sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62a-32: tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs bzhed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-0: go 'byed rdo @62b rje'i ljags brkyang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-1: dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-2: rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-3: che mchog gong na med pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-4: gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-5: thabs mkhas byin rlabs che bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-6: las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-7: khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-8: slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-10: h'um/ thabs mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-11: rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-12: gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-13: rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-14: 'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-15: che ba'i che ba zil gyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-16: sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-17: rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga to gu hya badzra ratna ma ku t'a tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-20: h'um thabs mkhas byin rlabs chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-22: byin rlabs chen po rnam bzhi po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-23: dbang bskur gnang phyir gtad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-24: rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-25: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-26: mu stegs rtag chad yan chad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-28: khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-30: sems can kun gyi re ba ba skong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-31: aom sa ma ya gu hya ae bam ma ya aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-32: slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:62b-33: khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sgyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-1: ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-2: thig le byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-3: nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-4: ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-5: nga ni spyi dpal bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-6: skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin; ;sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-7: khyed kyi lce la phab pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-8: snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-9: rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs mchog zung sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-11: byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-12: sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-13: rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-14: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-15: bstan pa phyi nang zab mo kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-16: sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-17: rdo rje lce yi sgo phye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-18: bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-19: dad ldan skyes bu ngom par byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-20: sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-21: zhi khro 'byams pa'i gter sgoms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-22: srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-23: dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-24: skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-25: gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-26: dus gsum rtsa ba gcad par byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-27: phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-28: rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-29: byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-30: 'gro don byang chub sems kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-31: sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-32: rnal 'byor chen pos dam du zungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-34: h'um/ de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63a-35: mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-0: @63b me shes rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-1: snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-2: h'um nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-3: thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-4: dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-5: sgom dang sgrub pas mi 'byangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-6: rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-7: rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-8: khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur cig //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-9: shr'i mah'a su kha badzra bo dhi h'um ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-11: mi 'gyur ba yi ye shes gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-12: ma btsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-13: ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-14: gong na med pas kun gyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-15: ye shes rang byung bdal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-17: aom mah'a gu hya brum dzany'a na mandal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-18: dzany'a na gu hya siddhi sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-19: gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-20: 'gyur ba med pa'i sman mchog thig le lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-21: mtshan mchog rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga to gu hya aatma aa bhi shinytsa ho ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-23: khyung gi gshog pa g-yas g-yon gdengs pa yis; ;klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-24: srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-25: sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-26: mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga to mah'a gu hya badzra aa bhi shinytsa ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-28: h'um bde ba chen po rang gnas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:63b-29: ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga to gu hya aa nu r'a ga ta badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-5: dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-6: rgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-7: rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-8: dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po nges thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig stan chen po'i 'phrin las mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-10: ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-12: zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-14: lnga yi tshom bu yang dag gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-15: sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-16: ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar ba'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-17: gtsug tu snang mdzad sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-18: skur skyed bya ni rlabs rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-20: zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-21: nyi zla steng du de bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-22: shes pa gsum po dbyings su bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-23: rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-24: ljang khu ni ru 'phang bstod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-25: ni ljang h'um du gnas bsgyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64a-27: h'um ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-0: @64b dkar la gsal bar skur bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-2: rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-3: yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-4: le brgan h'um ni dbyings su sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-5: kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-6: sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-8: sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-9: zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-10: gnas 'di kun bzang yum gyi mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-11: sa 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-12: mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan steng tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-13: mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyas bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-14: mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-15: rtag tu sku mchog g-yung drung sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-16: ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-17: de nas ye shes rgyal po des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-18: gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-19: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed na; ;rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-20: de kun gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-21: nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-22: 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis dbyings su thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-23: 'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-24: bco brgyad phrag gnyis h'um spros pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-25: klong du h'um chen gcig tu 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-26: kha dog rnam bzhi yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-27: rigs bzhi lha mo rnam spros te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-28: stong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-29: la la gsang mchog dbyings su 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-30: la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:64b-31: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-2: rin chen do shal se mo do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-3: dbyibs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-4: bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-5: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-6: la la 'gro ba re ba skong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-7: la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-8: kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-9: nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-10: gnyis su med par 'khril nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-11: 'khril nas ga na'i mchod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-12: stong khams yungs 'brur gzhug tshul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-13: ga na'i mchod pa chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-14: thams cad mnyes pa chen por gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-15: de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-16: ae ma'o bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-17: sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-18: ma chags pa yi ngo bo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-19: chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-20: spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-21: rtogs nas chags pas su spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-22: yang dag chags pa chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-23: 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-24: sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-25: zhing bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65a-27: de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-0: sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma @65b chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-1: thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-3: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-4: dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-6: 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar nges; ;glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-7: chos kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-8: bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-9: yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos grub len //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-10: rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-12: a'a li k'a li'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-13: thams cad grub cing rdo rje nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-14: rgyu 'bras dbyings su sbyor shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-15: bla ma'i dgongs pa gang sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-16: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-17: skye ba rnam gzhi rgyud sbyangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-18: mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-19: zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-20: de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i mdzad spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-22: aom// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-23: ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-24: bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-25: snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-28: aom// rdo rje bsod nams thig le che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-29: rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:65b-30: rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-4: aom/ mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-5: mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-6: mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim; ;sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-8: sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-9: yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-10: ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-11: 'dus pa'i rdzogs chen thig le che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-14: aom/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-15: rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-16: sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-17: skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-20: aom/ thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-21: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-26: aom/ thams cad thig le bla ma'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-27: sgyu 'phrul bla ma thig le'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-28: dbyings nyid byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-29: snying po bla ma nges pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-30: thig le nyid las g-yos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-31: ho; sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-32: tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis mnyes pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66a-33: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-0: bdag tu lta ba dang rmongs pa'i dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen @66b bo ni ma rtogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-1: sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par zhen pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-3: bram ze'i ngan sngags mang po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-4: blo'i gdeng du blangs nas snying rje chen bo'i las dang ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-6: gnas su ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-8: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-10: 'dod chags spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-11: rang rig pa'i ye shes ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-13: don dam pa la kun tu gti mug pas rgyun tu khebs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-14: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni; ma rtogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-15: nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-17: tshad med pa bzhi'i las dang ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-19: phrag dog gi tshub mas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-20: rgyun du khrid de bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rdo rje dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-21: de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-22: las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dvags srin po chen po lus gcig mgo bo brgya pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:66b-24: lus brgya pa mgo bo gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67a-1: yan lag mang po 'dug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul ba'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67a-2: de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67a-3: khams gsum gyi sems can bde ba la gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67a-4: de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyibs nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis padma rgyas par mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-0: h'um h'um h'um badzra dzva bi sha kro dha badzra dzva la manda la phat phat ha la ha la h'um zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi @67b phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod pa dal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dba' rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rgya gra ma mig mang ris su bris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-1: phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-2: sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-3: rdo rje rin po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-4: steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-5: rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mang du bris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-6: rtse mo dbyibs bla mas 'og min kyi gnas nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mang gcig tu 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-7: ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-8: rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-9: ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi gra bzhi nas bsgreng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-10: gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-11: rdo rje rin po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:67b-12: phyi dang nad med pa kun tu yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-0: khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong @68a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-1: gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed thon par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-2: de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-5: thor thor dang; gtogs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-9: sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' rtul che zhing ba rtul zhugs can rnams brgyal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-10: rab tu brgyal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-11: de nas dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-12: mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-13: h'um badzra du tri nan s'urya tsanta padma mandal de ba tishthi nam zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng+ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-14: gdan bla ma nyi zla dang padma spel bar bting ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-15: de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68a-16: bsam gtan bla ma chen po spags pa tshad med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-0: dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu @68b btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-1: bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-2: rdo rje ljags kyi gsung 'phrug stong gi sgra sgrog pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-3: ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-4: steng 'og med par kun du skyi bung zhes byed pa dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-5: zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-6: phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-7: dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-8: spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-9: rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bkab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-10: khros pa'i rgya mo mthong nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-11: gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du mah'a de ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-12: 'dod pa'i lhag na rgyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das buddha he ru ka sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-13: dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:68b-14: phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-1: khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-2: lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan steng du gshin rje gan rgyal du bskyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das ratna he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-4: dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-5: rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-6: nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtizbs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po bhing gi ri ti gna rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das padma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-8: dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-9: padma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69a-10: byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan steng du gnod sbyin stobs bzang gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-0: mtshon @69b cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-1: dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-2: las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-3: de nas dregs pa'i chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-4: thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de yang sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i dmangs skad chen po 'di dag phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-7: ha ha ha; kh'a hi kh'a hi kh'a hi zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang rol kun drangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-8: yan lag kun gcad gtubs te sha zos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-11: de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis h'um h'um h'um bhyo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:69b-12: ae aa ra li dz'a dz'a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-0: de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi @70a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-2: dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-3: srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-28: ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-29: bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-30: gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa bran dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70a-33: yang g-yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus so; ;de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-0: badzra padma pra be sha padma h'um aa la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin @70b du chags pa'i yid g-yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khab len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srun mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-1: bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga yang 'khril lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-2: bcom ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i sku la bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-3: bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-4: bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku la me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-5: de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis h'um zhes brjod pas padma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-6: de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te thon par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:70b-7: thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-0: de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te thon nas yang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jig @71a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-1: pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-2: de nas dgyes te phat ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-3: yid chos dbyings nas rol te spor byed nyi zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan steng du rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-4: de nas dgyes te phat ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje sring 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-5: de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sbrin las buddha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phat ces brjod pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig char zhugs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:71b-1: aom badzra aa mri ta mah'a kro dhi aam aam zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i snam logs nas thon to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-22: dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-24: zhes gsungs pas 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing sti ra rngam pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-26: ae yi tshogs chen 'byams pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-27: sti ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-28: h'um ha he phat sgra 'byin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84a-29: yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-0: @84b ru lu h'um bhyo'i gsung sgrog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-1: khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-2: srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-3: stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-4: sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-5: gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-6: mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-7: sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-8: stong gsum khro bo'i tshogs kyis bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-9: kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-10: rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum bshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-11: rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-12: rnga sgra chen pos srid gsum sbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-13: rnga sgra chen pos sgra bgegs 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-14: rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs; ;rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-15: na rag dmyal khams stong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-16: rnga sgra stug chen ri rab snyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-17: sti ra rnga chen sgra phyung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-18: phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-19: rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-20: rnga thabs glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-22: ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bskangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-23: rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-24: sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-25: nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas sbar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-26: rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-27: sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-28: lha dang mi yi theg pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-29: bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-30: sti ra rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-31: stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:84b-32: kun kyang rnga rdung di ri ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-2: rnga skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-3: byin rlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-5: rnga thabs g-yab mor por ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-6: kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-7: thams cad gnam lcags chen pos btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-8: ka la chen po la sogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-9: rdo rje lcags 'og ldogs pa'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-11: sti ra chen po'i rnga sgra yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-12: srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-13: dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-14: rnga sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-15: bsam rdzogs che la dbang thang thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-16: rnga sgras g-yo ba med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-18: rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-19: byang chub sems ltar de ma thag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-20: ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-23: h'um/ gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-25: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-26: mche ba zang yag za byed che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-29: h'um/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85a-30: tug chem ri rab 'bum snyil skad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-0: @85b aa la la yi gad rgyangs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-1: sbyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g-yeng ba che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-4: h'um/ khro bo'i shes rab 'od po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-5: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-7: sna tshogs ye shes thig le che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-10: h'um/ khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-13: sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-16: h'um/ bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-17: bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-19: 'jigs byed chen po gdal pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-21: h'um/ rdo rje brag chen sra pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-22: rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-23: rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-24: rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-27: h'um/ stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-28: 'jigs byed mtshon du med pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-29: sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-30: 'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-31: ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-32: sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-33: lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-34: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-35: gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-36: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-37: nges don chos kyi snying po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:85b-38: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-4: sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-6: 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-7: stan chen po'i dbyings su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-9: gan chen po'i dbyings su sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-10: snang sring kha dog mang po yang; ;ga na chen po'i lam du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-11: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-12: rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-13: de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-14: rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas; ;tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-15: nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-16: bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-17: ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-18: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86a-19: gdeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-002:86b-0: rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog @86b rdzogs so ////
